chinese: ad.愉快的，欢乐的adu很，非常
english: jolly

chinese: 圣诞老人看起来一如既往地欢乐！他一定很喜欢那些饼干！
english: Santa looks as jolly as ever, He must be happy with those cookies

chinese: n. 隐私；秘密；私生活
english: privacy

chinese: 我们可以通过给手机加密来保护我们的个人隐私。
english: We can protect our personal privacy by enabling pin codes on our phones

chinese: n抓痕，擦伤 因抓破，划破
english: scratch

chinese: 猫在墙上留下了一些抓痕。
english: The cat leaves some scratches on the wall

chinese: n.受命进行的工作 以.授权
english: mandate

chinese: 这个警察受命搜查他的家。
english: The policeman had a mandate to search his house

chinese: adj！ 最低限度的
english: minimal

chinese: 广告强调这个手术的风险微乎其微。
english: The advertisement emphasizes that the risk involved in the surgery is minimal

chinese: cd必需的，必不可心的；基本的，作为组成部分的；整体的
english: integral

chinese: 结实的链子得环环相扣。
english: Every link is integral to the strength of the chain

chinese: adj，数不清的；无数的
english: innumerable

chinese: 夜空中有数不清的星星。
english: There are innumerable stars in the night sky

chinese: n. 危险；（被告处于被判罪或受处罚的）危险境地
english: jeopardy

chinese: 这个男人站在危墙边，将自己置于危险之中。
english: The man put himself in jeopardy by standing next to the falling wall

chinese: 努力，奋斗
english: strive

chinese: 他会为自己想要的东西而奋斗。
english: He will strive for what he wants

chinese: 1.骑士
english: knight

chinese: 骑士保护我们的村庄免于被入侵。
english: The knight protected our village from intruders

chinese: 加.公式，方程式；方案；方法；配方奶
english: formula

chinese: 这个男孩儿很小的时候就学会了一些数理公式。
english: The boy learned math and science formulas at a young age

chinese: n.外科医生
english: surgeon

chinese: 我的外科医生决定给我动手术。
english: My surgeon decided to give me an operation

chinese: D.徽章；象征；标记 u.给…•做标记；授予•⋯
english: badge

chinese: 小男孩因为出色的成绩得到了奖章，并将它别在了自己的外套上。
english: The boy received a badge for his good work, and pinned it on his coat

chinese: n，参与者
english: participant

chinese: 每个参与者都聚精会神地听了演讲。
english: Every participant focused on the lecture

chinese: ad：多余的，过剩的
english: redundant

chinese: 旧的蒸汽火车被新式火车所取代，显得过时多
english: The old steam train is redundant and has been replaced with newer trains

chinese: Qd）.踌躇的，犹豫不决的
english: hesitant

chinese: 她站在冰箱前，犹豫着要吃什么。
english: She stands in front of the fridge, hesitant about what to eat
